Operations on the text editor software

column1: User selects only one character by mouse on the text editor software and that character has more than two homonymous characters

1. Application is running as a resident function
2. User is working on a text editor software

column2: User selects only one character on the text editor software by using mouse.

column6: System will check the homonymous characters (all glypths of same IVS) of character selected on the text editor software. In case, there're more than two characters existing, system will display IVS palette.
column9:
On the IVS palette:
- The character selected as default is the same as the character selected on the text editor software in case the [Base Character Code][Variation Selector Code] is found.
- If NOT, the first character on the IVS palette is selected as default.
